author: Jane C. Timm
title: Fact check: Trump falsely claims he inherited 'broken' COVID-19 tests
description: Fact check: Did Trump inherit broken coronavirus tests?
content:
The original test, the ones we inherited were broken, they were obsolete, they were not good tests, Trump said during Friday nights news conference.
Weve fact checked this claim before. It's impossible for Trump to have inherited a broken testing system for … [+7039 chars]
